title: US Sales Financial Analyst, Demand Forecasting & Analysis
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish!...
description: - Financial modeling, reporting and market analysis, and written and verbal presentations to senior management and executives. - Forecasting weekly sell through, sell in and channel inventory by analyzing performance to date and assessing potential risks and opportunities - Proposing detailed revisions to current quarter forecast on a weekly basis...
